org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.input.event

Class TouchEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.event.Event
      • org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.input.event.TouchEvent

  • public class TouchEvent
extends Event
    The TouchEvent class stores information about a touch event (Android)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String EVENT_DESCRIPTION

      static int EVENT_UP 
      boolean isDown
      A boolean representing whether the touch was going down

      The x position of the touch event

      The y position of the touch event
